author: Cass Marshall
title: Families are moving weddings, birthday parties, and phone nights into online games
description: As the coronavirus quarantine continues, families are using online gaming to connect. Platforms like World of Warcraft and Roblox become more than just games; they’re ways for people to meet up online, and hold birthday parties, weddings, and other big life e…
content: Between grad school and a health scare, the last four years had been hard for Madeline. Her April 2020 wedding was meant to be a reset button. Family was flying in from Portugal and Ireland, including Madelines grandparents, who she hadnt seen in years. The c… [+7017 chars]
